Afeefa Messaging API

Notice:

  • the {{placeholders}} in the template are possible parameters; for simplicity they are not documented in the params table
  • Pass in all parameters as json like so { "to":"max@test.de", "key":"9zf8sdf" }
  • also be sure to set "Content-Type" header to "application/json"
POST /send/test
Key Type Description
key string secret key to authorize
to string e-mail address, where the test mail is sent to 
POST /send/newEntryInfo

the mail's reply_to is being set to {{email}}

Key Type Description
key string secret key to authorize
to string e-mail address, where the mail is sent to
Default: see config		 
POST /send/messageFromUserToOwner

the mail's reply_to is being set to {{email}}

Key Type Description
key string secret key to authorize
to string email address of the entry owner, who receives the user's message 
POST /send/feedbackFromUserToAdmins

the mail's reply_to is being set to {{email}}

Key Type Description
key string secret key to authorize
to string e-mail address, where the mail is sent to
Default: see config
